main.name: Ameya Laad
main.bio: A student at BITS Pilani K. K. Birla Goa Campus, I am interested in Deep Learning applications as well as full-stack development technologies. I have previously worked with a variety of technologies and have experience in Tensorflow, React, Ionic, Android, Bootstrap and Python
main.contactmessage: Hi there! Please enter your message below.

resume.skillmessage: Skilled in working with JavaScript, I love to create full-stack web applications. I have a thrill towards Deep Learning, and would love to collaborate on it.

education.school: BITS Pilani, K. K. Birla Goa Campus

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Worked with the Windows Defender team on a Chrome extension (>40k downloads) for Data Leak Prevention. Introduced a new feature to inform users about the sensitivity of a document.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: I analyzed data for the Microsoft Bookings platform. This included analysis of existing telemetry as well as identifying missing datapoints and adding them. The website was based on the React framework

work.title: Intern
work.description: Developed a milk delivery service application as a Full Stack developer using Ionic Framework, Loopback and MongoDB.

projects.title: Predicting COVID-19 in India using Machine Learning
projects.category: Tested over 5 machine (LR, ARIMA, HMM) and deep learning (LSTM, Seq2Seq) models against the second wave of the disease.

projects.title: Rasoee
projects.category: Developed an Android application that can recognize images of food, and give links to recipes using an API call.

projects.title: React Website
projects.category: The website you are currently on

projects.title: ChainVoter
projects.category: A blockchain based voting mechanism. This uses the Microsft Azure FaceAPI for security

projects.title: IRCS EQAS Website
projects.category: A website I designed for IRCS Mumbai's Blood Bank
